name: Lost Mint Spaceship
description:
This is an action shooter survival minigame.

"Do you hear me? Hey..."   "Yeah, I'm here... Listening." "You lost yourself from the rest of the patrol! OH-MY-GOSH! Weeelll, if that wasn't enough, you were found by an insane horde of Kzarneon army. ~Weeelll~, congratulations! ...+@!#-(@;$ Pilot 55, I lost... (##;-#)4+#)@ nnection, I'm... (@+#-@:(*-$+#)..." "Ohhh, sh%t!

More about the game here and here.
